backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no exposed functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing the static meme image requirement and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing highâ€‘level summaries of major frontend components, hooks, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style definitions with OKLCH color tokens and dark-mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app at /src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing acceptance state and rendering neon hearts, success meme, and evasive button logic.
frontend/src/components/NeonHeartsBackgr: Canvas animation component that draws floating neon hearts with pointer interaction effects.
frontend/src/components/SuccessMeme.tsx: Displays the generated static meme image and success caption when accepted.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveButton.ts: Hook computing random safe positions to move the evasive button away from the cursor and the yes button.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers, defines OKLCH-based theme variables, and adds neon text/button styles with glow animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, extended theme settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state and feature requests for a romantic Valentine page with neon hearts, evasive button behavior, and a meme reveal.
